bill.title: DFA; authorize to purchase real property from willing sellers for the use and benefit of state institutions of higher learning.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Department Of Finance And Administration, Acting On Behalf Of The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning, To Purchase Certain Real Property For The Use And Benefits Of The State Institutions Of Higher Learning; To Authorize The Department To Lease The Acquired Property To A Person, Corporation Or Other Legal Entity For Purposes Of Economic Development To Benefit The State Institutions Of Higher Learning In The Area Of The Property; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Property;Universities and Colleges
